app_name: Groups Treatment Groups Apple Translate Langotalk AI Language Learning
app_description: Langotalk is the world s best AI Language Learning App for friendly stress free chats. In the app you can simply chat or speak with dozens of AI Bots on anything you like in your desired language and get auto corrected by the AI. Langotalk uses the best AI technology in the market to enhance language learning. We believe that AI enables a very personal method for language learning which is tailored to your level preferred way of learning and interests which makes learning much more fun and effective. Our mission is to enhance your language learning journey using this revolutionary technology. The app is already used by over 50 000 people and we get great reviews on a daily basis.
